title: ***MASA
seo_description: If you’re looking for a truly special meal, Masa is the place to be. The intentionally minimalistic interior allows chef Masayoshi Takayama to paint a beautiful picture through his multicourse omakase menu. Masa is one of the priciest sushi experiences in the country, but with three Michelin stars, it’s also one you’ll never forget.
contents:
Uni Risotto
10 Columbus Circle
walk: 9 minutes

If you’re looking for a truly special meal, Masa is the place to be. The intentionally minimalistic interior allows chef Masayoshi Takayama to paint a beautiful picture through his multicourse omakase menu. Masa is one of the priciest sushi experiences in the country, but with three Michelin stars, it’s also one you’ll never forget.
